title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The first point requires a sum of integrals where the integrands are ( r 2  ( θ ) ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaadkhadaWgaa WcbaGaaGOmaaqabaGccaaMi8+aaeWaaeaacqaH4oqCaiaawIcacaGL PaaaaiaawIcacaGLPaaadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaaaa@3C5F@ and ( r 1 ( θ ) ) 2 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaadkhadaWgaa WcbaGaaGymaaqabaGcdaqadaqaaiabeI7aXbGaayjkaiaawMcaaaGa ayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiaac6caaaa@3B89@

The second point requires 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaaca aIYaaaaaaa@34BB@ in each integral and correct limits for each integral. Errors with the value of c MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGJbaaaa@341C@ impact the second point.

Arithmetic errors impact the third point. A simplified answer is not required. Eligibility for the third point requires (1) a sum of integrals where the integrands are k ( r 2  ( θ ) ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGRbWaaeWaaeaacaWGYb WaaSbaaSqaaiaaikdaaeqaaOGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaeqiUdehacaGL OaGaayzkaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaa@3D4F@ and k ( r 1 ( θ ) ) 2 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGRbWaaeWaaeaacaWGYb WaaSbaaSqaaiaaigdaaeqaaOWaaeWaaeaacqaH4oqCaiaawIcacaGL PaaaaiaawIcacaGLPaaadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccaGGSaaaaa@3C77@ (2) 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaaca aIYaaaaaaa@34BB@ in each integral, and (3) correct and consistent limits based on the response’s value for c. title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The first point may be earned for use of correct values without an explicit statement of dy dx = dy dθ dx dθ . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaadsgacaWG5b aabaGaamizaiaadIhaaaGaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaadsga caWG5baabaGaamizaiabeI7aXbaaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaadsgacaWG4b aabaGaamizaiabeI7aXbaaaaGaaiOlaaaa@4204@

The second point requires tan 2= dy dθ 2cos 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaciGG0bGaaiyyaiaac6gaca aMe8UaaGOmaiabg2da9maalaaabaWaaSaaaeaacaWGKbGaamyEaaqa aiaadsgacqaH4oqCaaaabaGaaGOmaiGacogacaGGVbGaai4Caiaays W7caaIYaaaaaaa@43D2@ or equivalent.

A simplified answer is not required. Trigonometric function values do not need to be evaluated.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The first point requires evidence of the derivative being used.

The second and third points may be earned for a consistent and correct use of an incorrect value of θ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqaH4oqCaaa@34EA@ based on one computational error.

The third point requires evaluation at all three values of θ.
